Pinax is applying for [http://code.google.com/soc/ Google Summer of Code 2009]. This page aims to provide information how you can participate and what you could work on. 

== Communication ==

Please use the [http://groups.google.com/group/pinax-users Pinax Mailing List] or the #pinax channel on irc.freenode.net if you have any questions.

== Ideas == 

Here are some suggestions we found to be interesting topics for the Summer of Code.

But please don't hesitate to submit proposals that are not listed here.

  * Add support for multilingual content (see http://code.google.com/p/django-hotclub/issues/detail?id=173)
  * Admin interface - Create an unified admin interface based on Django's admin app
  * Integrate more reusable apps (see http://code.google.com/p/django-hotclub/wiki/WishList)
  * Create a sample project that uses Satchmo (http://www.satchmoproject.com/)
  * Make Pinax run on Google App Engine
